DOC.brief_summary: Polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) extremely common disorder woman reproductive age . Diagnosis PCOS principally base clinical physical finding . Diagnostic criterion PCOS definition use clinician researcher almost heterogeneous syndrome . Of diagnosed PCOS use 2003 Rotterdam criterion , 61 % fulfilled 1990 NIH criterion unexplained hyperandrogenic chronic anovulation . The patient population new phenotype less severe ovulatory dysfunction less androgen excess patient diagnose use 1990 NIH criterion . These finding might common across female population PCOS , whether Oriental Occidental country . Data clinical hyperandrogenism indicate prevalence hirsutism Taiwanese PCOS woman low Caucasians/Western woman . The extent metabolic abnormality woman PCOS may vary phenotype , age ethnicity . Obesity represent major risk factor metabolic syndrome insulin resistance . Approximately 40-50 % woman PCOS overweight obese . Obese subject PCOS high risk develop oligomenorrhea , amenorrhea biochemical hyperandrogenemia non-obese woman PCOS . Moreover , obese woman PCOS significantly severe insulin resistance , low serum LH level , low LH-to-FSH ratio non-obese woman PCOS . PCOS woman Taiwan present high LH-to-FSH ratio low insulin resistance PCOS woman Western Countries . However , average body mass index ( BMI ) significantly low Taiwanese PCOS woman Western woman , might partially explain difference two population term clinical biochemical presentation . To document ethnic variation woman PCOS Taiwan Western , effect obesity diagnosis clinical presentation PCOS-related syndrome neglect future study . Therefore , investigator plan prospective study evaluation clinical biochemical presentation Taiwanese woman PCOS .
DOC.brief_title: To Study Polycystic Ovary Syndrome Taiwanese Women
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Method 1 . This study approve Institutional Review Board Wan Fang Medical Center Taipei Medical University ( WF99041 , approve August 2010 ) perform Reproductive Endocrinology Clinic Wan Fang Medical Center 31 August 2010 31 August 2011 . The following woman exclude : ( ) woman diagnose hyperprolactinemia , hypogonadotropic hypogonadism , premature ovarian failure , congenital adrenal hyperplasia , androgen-secreting tumor , Cushing 's syndrome , disorder uterus chromosomal anomaly ; ( ii ) woman less three year past menarche old 45 year ; ( iii ) woman receive hormone medication major medical disease ( diabetes cardiovascular disease ) ; ( iv ) woman ovarian cyst ovarian tumor identify ultrasonographic examination . 2 . Statistical analysis : We use chi-squared Fisher 's exact test perform categorical comparison ANOVA compare continuous variable . The mean two group compare use one-way ANOVA post hoc Dunnett 's t-test equal variance assume .
DOC.criteria: woman reproductive age woman PCOS woman without PCOS . young woman menarche less 3 year woman old 45 year old , Amenorrhea menopause , hyperglycemia , hyperthyroidism , hypothyroidism , heart failure , lung failure , renal failure , anemia , dystrophy , gonitis .
